content.text:
# 2026 Rajshahi Warriors season

The 2025-26 season is the 8th season for the Bangladesh Premier League franchise, Rajshahi Warriors.They as Durbar Rajshahi were one of the seven teams participating in the last season and became 5th there. They became champion the only time in the 2019-20 season as Rajshahi Royals, beating Khulna Tigers in the final. In November 2025, the team was acquired by Nabil Group of Industries and re-named.
